sentences.en: An infelicitous remark; infelicitous phrasing; the infelicitous typeset ting was due to illegible copy.
sentences.cn: 不恰当的评论；不贴切的措辞；错误的排版是因为原稿潦草难认。

sentences.en: Infelicitous remark; infelicitous phrasing infelicitous typesetting was due to illegiblecopy.
sentences.cn: 不恰当的评论；不贴切的措辞；错误的排版是因为原稿潦草难认。

sentences.en: The infelicitous typesetting was due to illegible copy.
sentences.cn: 错误的排版是由于难以辨认的拷贝造成的.

sentences.en: There are several infelicitous remarks in this article.
sentences.cn: 文中有一些不贴切的措辞。

sentences.en: This infelicitous term partly refers to offering consumers a discount to build their own furniture.
sentences.cn: 这个不太恰当的词汇,部分意思是指向顾客提供折扣,由他们自己组装家具.

words.tran_cn: 不幸的；不适当的；不吉利的

trans.tran_cn: 不恰当的，不幸的，不适当的， 不贴切的
